projects.title: SUKI SUSHI
descriptions: Map application which provides location of sushi restaurants in Vancouver, CA.
Using graphQL and Apollo to fetch Yelp API for datas about sushi restaurants.
Click a pin to see a restaurant detail and add to your favourite.
Using MongoDB to store database for account and favourite restaurants.

projects.title: U Watch
descriptions: Watch e-commerce website used redux toolkit to manage item data in user cart.
Item stock amount will be decreased when you order completely.
Able to search by keyword of company name or item name.
Used firebase firestore to store item data and user ordering data, customer support data.

projects.title: Trello Board
descriptions: Trello board which manages tasks and collaborative work.
Using node.js and express.js for managing data on the server side.
Able to drag and drop task cards.
Using MongoDB to store databases for accounts and tasks.

projects.title: Weather app
descriptions: A web application that tells the current weather, hourly weather, weekly weather and temperatures in a specific city.
The background image will be changed depends on current weather and local time.
Built with Next.js and Tailwind css, Open Weather API.

projects.title: Seattle DJ Website
descriptions: A website that has a client who is a DJ in Seattle, US.
Created web design based on his request and his favourite.
Used Cloudinary for storage data and used Emailjs for receiving, sending auto reply.
Created json file for making it easy to upload his new audio file.

projects.title: Shiho N Portfolio
descriptions: A portfolio website that produces myself and shows my project.
Created design all by myself and made all logos and images by using Inkscape and Figma.
Used framer-motion to make images or logos effectively and impressively.
Created contact form that makes users contact me from the website and provide them auto reply.
